GBT Bau Sampah, Ini 4 Stadion Lain Venue Piala Dunia U20
01 Nov 2019, 12:54 by Anik Hasanah


GBT Bau Sampah, Ini 4 Stadion Lain Venue Piala Dunia U20

KBRN, Surabaya : Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah meminta kepada Menteri Pemuda dan Olah Raga (Menpora) agar salah satu stadion di Jatim menjadi venue penyelenggaraan Piala Dunia U-20, dari 10 stadion yang diajukan. Khofifah menawarkan sejumlah stadion di Jatim, beberapa diantaranya adalah Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT), Stadion Kanjuruhan Malang, Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo, Stadion Surajaya Lamongan, dan Stadion Gelora Bangkalan. "Maka dari awal saya menyampaikan opsi, ini kan diajukan 10 titik, salah satunya GBT, tetapi saya sudah ke GBT kalau sore kena angin itu suka aroma sampah," ujarnya, Jumat (1/11/2019).Jauh sebelum kejadian kerusuhan oleh oknum suporter Persebaya Surabaya, GBT bukan satu-satunya opsi stadion yang ditawarkan. Aroma kurang sedap akibat sampah, dikhawatirkan akan mengganggu pertandingan. "Engko nek pas FIFA kesana terus pas anginnya masuk, ini aroma apa? Makanya kita menyampaikan opsi lain pokoke Jawa Timur harus ada yang dijadikan venue," imbuhnya. Khofifah menjelaskan, pertimbangan pemilihan Stadion Kanjuruhan Malang,  dapat mensuport latihan tim yang akan bertanding. Sedangkan Stadion Gelora Delta Sidoarjo, tim harus gelar latihan di wilayah Surabaya. "Tapi kalau di Kanjuruhan, relatif itu tersuport. Bukan soal Bonek mania atau Arema lo rek," tambahnya. Gubernur menegaskan, hanya ingin salah satu Stadion di Jatim menjadi 1 diantara 10 venue yang diajukan ke FIFA sebagai tempat penyelenggaraan pertandingan sepak bola Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021. "Makanya harus ada opsi, dari awal lo ya bahasa saya. Sehingga kalau ini kurang, bagaimana kalau ini. Kalau ini kurang, kurangnya apa. Yang ngerti adalah sudah mengetahui standart FIFA," ucapnya.

GBT Smells of Trash, These are 4 Other U20 World Cup Venue Stadiums
Nov 1 2019, 12:54 by Anik Hasanah


GBT Smells of Trash, These are 4 Other U20 World Cup Venue Stadiums

KBRN, Surabaya: East Java Governor Khofifah asked the Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) that one of the stadiums in East Java be the venue for the U-20 World Cup, out of the 10 proposed stadiums. Khofifah offers a number of stadiums in East Java, some of which are the Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium (GBT), Kanjempuan Malang Stadium, Gelora Delta Sidoarjo Stadium, Surajaya Lamongan Stadium, and Bangkora Gelora Stadium. "So from the start I submitted an option, this was proposed 10 points, one of which was GBT, but I have already been to GBT if the afternoon was hit by the wind like the smell of garbage," he said, Friday (11/01/2019). Persebaya Surabaya supporters, GBT is not the only stadium option offered. The smell is less pleasant due to garbage, it is feared that it will disrupt the match. "Engko grandma when FIFA went there, and when the wind came in, what was this aroma? So, we said that there were other options for East Java to be used as a venue," he added. Khofifah explained, the consideration of the election of the Malang Kanjempuan Stadium could support the training of the teams that would compete. While the Gelora Delta Sidoarjo Stadium, the team must hold a training degree in the Surabaya area. "But in Kanjuruhan, the relative is supported. It is not a matter of Bonek mania or Arema lo rek," he added. The governor asserted, only wanted one of the stadiums in East Java to be 1 of the 10 venues submitted to FIFA as the venue for the 2021 U-20 World Cup soccer match. "So there must be an option, from the beginning you will be my language. "What about this? If it's lacking, what is lacking. What I understand is that I already know FIFA's standards," he said.
